arts.ttl: Why Blackburn Rovers boss John Eustace was 'upset' with Scott Parker after Burnley's derby win

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers boss John Eustace pinpoints one key difference following Burnley's derby victory
arts.sum: John Eustace felt Burnley’s superior quality in front of goal was the key difference after his Blackburn Rovers side were edged out in the East Lancashire derby.

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Blackburn Rovers as 'simply superb' defender earns 9/10 after derby win - gallery
arts.sum: Zian Flemming’s expertly-taken header saw Burnley continue their fine run of form against their rivals Blackburn Rovers.

arts.ttl: 'To get promoted' - John Eustace's Blackburn Rovers verdict after Burnley defeat

arts.ttl: Scott Parker speaks of satisfaction after Burnley's derby victory against Blackburn Rovers
arts.sum: Scott Parker spoke of his satisfaction and “relief” after his side continued Burnley’s impressive record against fierce rivals Blackburn Rovers.

arts.ttl: Zian Flemming heads miserly Burnley past Blackburn in cagey derby
arts.sum: Winning derbies is not about the quality of performance, it is about the result and Burnley fans will not be complaining after Zian Flemming earned them the points against their bitter rivals in a tight but underwhelming encounter. The significance of the victory was indicated at full-time as the players led raucous celebrations after boosting their promotion ambitions. The dire nature of the first hour was forgotten, in the away end at least, when Flemming dived to head home Bashir Humphreys’s cross in front of 4,000 Burnley supporters. It was the first opening of note and the Dutchman should be commended for still being alert after having next to no involvement up to that point. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers 0-1 Burnley: Zian Flemming header sees Clarets gain derby spoils yet again
arts.sum: Burnley claimed another massive victory at Ewood to extend their impressive run against their fierce rivals Blackburn Rovers.

arts.ttl: Flemming heads winner as Burnley beat rivals Blackburn
arts.sum: Burnley got the better of East Lancashire rivals Blackburn by winning the derby 1-0 at Ewood Park.
